channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish on the pavement & street, 27th July
item.description:
It’s again 51 Chelmer Road that doesn’t recycle or separate the food waste. The foxes went though already. Now it’s left to the rats. Did mention that I had one in my garden?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chelmer Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illigal car parking in front of our windows, 27th July
item.description:
Due to incomplete double yellow line at the back of vauban estate behind 40-53. people park their car on gap of incomple double yellow line which is against our windows. Please complete gaps of double yellow line at the back of 40-53 vauban estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alscot Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street / Road littered with rubbish, 27th July
item.description:

item.title: Tree has constricting bike lock wrapped around trunk, 27th July
item.description:
Tree (ginko balboa) outside 13A Macclesfield St has had a bike lock wrapped around its trunk for some time which is going to start damaging the tree if it has not done so already. Please could you remove ? Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88, Shaftesbury Avenue, Bloomsbury, City of Westminster

item.title: Fly tipping in Riseholme House from Number 5, 27th July
item.description:
5 Riseholme House are clearly having their flat renovated. The builders keep dumping their rubbish and additional rubbish right outside 16, 17 & 18’s balcony. They have been caught doing it, even though there is a yellow sign that states no fly tipping. The rubbish has now been accumulating over the last few weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albrighton Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
